casebody.data:
Bohm et al., Respondents, v. Metropolitan El. Ry. Co. et al., Appellants. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. April 16, 1891.) Appeal from special term. Action by FTathan Bohm and another against the Metropolitan Elevated Railway Company and another. From a judgment for plaintiffs, defendants appeal.

Argued before Sedgwick, C. J., and Dugro, J.

Julien T. Davies and Osgood Smith, for appellants. Charles Gibson Bennett, for respondents. Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
